line.text: When forty winters shall besiege thy brow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And dig deep trenches in thy beauty field
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy youth proud livery so gazed on now
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Will be a tattered weed of small worth held
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then being asked where all thy beauty lies
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Where all the treasure of thy lusty days
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To say within thine own deep sunken eyes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Were an all-eating shame and thriftless praise
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How much more praise deserved thy beauty use
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If thou couldst answer This fair child of mine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Shall sum my count and make my old excuse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Proving his beauty by succession thine
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: This were to be new made when thou art old
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And see thy blood warm when thou feel it cold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
